thread.title: Tiny but location wins
thread.title_full: Tiny but location wins - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sabcfamily
title: Tiny but location wins
text: We have travelled to Homewood Suites for over a decade as our family grew. Traveling to NYC with our last teen this was the smallest HS we have been in - very compact and a bit too small for 5 nights and luggage but we made it work. No managers reception but cookies around 4pm. Breakfast was standard and if early enough space not a problem but it is during the rush. Easy walk to subway and times square but tough to find a cab. Quiet if not on the street side and great views from the 22 floor. Friendly front desk staff. We'd stay again for the location.
